title: FRIDAY -  Wide receivers possible return to NFL
itunes:title: FRIDAY -  Wide receivers possible return to NFL
description:
Week 7 of the NFL season kicked off Thursday night (:06) as the Eagles pulled out the thrilling win over the Giants. Looking ahead to Sunday's matchups (2:20) It's a battle of two undefeated teams as the Steelers take on the Titans. Tennessee running back Derrick Henry spoke about what it'll be like taking on the vaunted Pittsburgh defense (2:41). A pair of wide receivers could be returning to the NFL...Russell Wilson talks about the possibility of the Seahawks adding Antonio Brown (3:02), while Dez Bryant could be landing with the Ravens (3:56)...and Good Morning Football's Kyle Brandt previews the Buccaneers and Raiders game and talks about "handshake-gate" with Tom Brady (4:42)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
